Layer.Name: tri[8]
Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:SetDrawMode('triangles') self:SetNumVertices(3) self:SetPolygonMode(0) self:rotationz(180) local radi=32 local ang=360/3 for i=0,2 do local xpos=(radi*math.sin(math.rad(ang*(i)))) local ypos=(radi*math.cos(math.rad(ang*(i)))) self:SetVertexPosition(i,xpos,ypos,0) end end
